comments:
IES Driver: RC3 IES-20040621

When trying to run a Run-Time workbench on Linux I get the following error:

!SESSION Jun 17, 2004 10:38:03.299 ---------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=unknown
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM Windows 32 build cndev-20040605 (JIT enabled: 
jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi Jun 17, 2004 10:38:03.309
!MESSAGE Application error
!STACK 1
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.util.Hashtable.put(Hashtable.java(Compiled Code))
	at java.util.Properties.setProperty(Properties.java:130)
	at java.lang.System.setProperty(System.java:730)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.PlatformActivator$1.run
(PlatformActivator.java:308)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run
(EclipseStarter.java:272)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.run
(EclipseStarter.java:128)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:85)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:58)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke
(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:60)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:391)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:185)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:638)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:622)

Steps to Reproduce
==================
1. Create a Hello World Plug-in Project by selecting ?New -> Project -> Plug-in 
Project? from the workbench menu. Make sure to select ?Hello, World? Template 
when you reach the ?Template Dialog?.
Expected Behavior: new Plug-in Project is created and opened in the workbench
2.  Select the newly created project in Package Explorer View and choose ?Run -
> Run As -> Runtime Workbench? from the workbench menu. 
Note: You may choose to clear the configuration area before the Runtime 
Workbench is launched. 
Actual Behavior: The process of launching the Runtime Workbench is terminated 
after displaying a message stating that an error occurred when attempted to 
proceed with the this request.

I've seen 67358 and I thought it might be related, but I'm not sure.

This is a duplicate of bug 65427 which was fixed for RC3.  

You mention that you are running RC3 but that is likely your development 
environment.  The target is likely an older build.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 65427 ***
